reviews.review: One of the best games ever made. Worth every playthrough.

Это по моему мнению ЛУЧШАЯ ЧАСТЬ Half-life. И объясню я это просто: интересный сюжет + динамичный геймплей - это всё что надо для хорошей игры!
Ну это халфа что тут еще говорить 10000/10
это слишком прекрасно, чтобы комментировать и подбирать красивые слова))
Amazing gameplay, story line, and voice acting. Can't wait for episode 3 (which, I presume, is right around the corner)!
Is a very fun game and is very enjoyable wish there was a sequel thou

Этот эпизод в плане механик и динамики вышел лучше, но баги часто портят впечатление. Хотя главная моя претензия - игра меняет свой характер. Это уже не сложный вдумчивый мир, полный боли и страха - а чертов боевик с шутками и резкими сменами настроения. Но геймплейно все же это Half-Life.
9 из 10.

Fascinante como siempre. Siempre cada secuela mostrando diferencias de historia lo que lo hace muy entretenido. Muy recomendado toda la historia de Half Life y estoy a la espera de la Tercera entrega (sin contar la de Alyx)
Man crazy ending cant wait to play the third one.... oh wait
Absolutely classic experience. Driving sections seem a little outdated now but still a 10/10 experience.

Actually really good, i think its the best one from half life 2 and episode one.
finishing it now is kinda dissapointing knowing how long fans of the series have been stuck on the same ending for so many years.
still enjoyed the game.

Pros:
- Even more Half-Life 2!
- Awesome scenery/visuals
- Intense action
- New enemies (Hunters)

Cons:
- No new weapons
- The Hunters will REALLY kick your ass
- The Antlions will also kick your ass
- Sad ending....for about 14 years now

A big step-up from Episode One in many ways inside of a short package. From the very start the game gives you some of the best visuals of the Source Engine (for its time). The journey from the wrecked train to the White Forest feels long and well earned. It's certainly a step-up in difficulty too. I think the Hunters might be a little too challenging TBH, especially at the end. Maybe one day we'll get to see how it all ends...
Всегда боялся заставки в игре,когда поворачивался мужик

Timeless game.

Best final battle.

Greatest cliffhanger.
сейчас прикола не понял, почему у меня игра решила обновиться на 2 гига

This one felt really open and fresh in a way and imo better than episode 1. Sadly its maybe the last hl2 episode we will see from Valve. It was a bit difficult around the end as well. Spoilers:::
Felt a bit spooky with the Guardian in the nest. We got some new enemies which were really annoying at least for me - the hunters, the acid antlions, combine zombies. I really loved the engine sound of the car :D
Бля охрененная игра советую всем поиграть
Muito bom jogo, vale apena jogar!
Ya habiendo hecho las aclaraciones necesarias en la reseña del Half-Life 2 Episodio Uno (el salto que no me gustó de Half-Life a Half-Life 2) va cada vez mejor. Me gustó bastante este "capítulo"

Finished this game once again after a long, long break and I remembered how I felt when I found out that there wouldn't be Episode 3. What the duck, Valve?

The game is a must play though. Compared to Episode 2 some of the new features are actually pretty cool.

[h1] 勾起数3幻想的资料片第二章 [/h1]
依旧延续了前章剧情，爱莉克斯的剧情糖中藏刀，弗地冈人可爱又仗义，蚁狮幼崽垫脚刚刚好……游戏流程不长，但挑战性极强，面对的敌对玩家数量成倍增加，新增的敌对目标输出高，血量厚，对于弹药和准确度有一定要求。终章的守点任务三角机甲数量多，容错率低，刷怪间距大，守卫范围广，面对着四面八方袭来的三角机甲部队，要熟悉地图，还要考究自己对物理引擎的掌控，还要兼顾据点的安全，自己的血量…
剧情还有很多没有填上的坑，与爱莉克斯之后所要面对的挑战究竟如何，GMAN的目的究竟如何，以及最后出现的幼虫探员，茱蒂丝究竟去向何方……
来生还会有3吗，我想看看这些坑怎么填
啥都不说了，希望G胖有生之年数个3，直接数到4也行。
Игра хорошая! Подойдёт для Garry's Mod, ну а так то, КРУТАЯ ИГРА! (только жаль что нету Half Life 3(((((( )
That was a shit ending. Whatever monkey thought that was good needs to be fired immediately.
a good game if you want to cry yourself to sleep.

getting the "little rocket man" achievement was a trip, but it's relieving to know that he is in the rocket. Save before putting him in the rocket, and CLOSE THE DOOR. anyways back to what I was going to say, challenging, fun, after playing it for the 4th time it still presents quite the challenge.

FUCK YOU, WHY SO MANY HUNTERS?!??!
9/10
Another brilliant expansion to the Half-Life universe, though it is a shame one of the greatest cliff-hangers in video games has yet to be resolved.

A great send off to Half-Life 2. Although I didn't like how the ending was a cliff hanger. It was overall really really good. I enjoy the dark and desolate atmosphere of this game.
All the HL3 stuff makes sense now
在21年重温07年的游戏，画面全部拉最高还是能给人很舒服的感觉，剧情就更不用说了，感觉第二章比本体还好玩，第二章里的车的手感也特别舒服（@ubi）xd
Muchísimas Gracias VALVe por esta gran saga, es espectacular este episode two, una obra maestra!
Отличное продолжение и очень печальный финал
